inn1.comm: PK starts with an inswinger and Mahela leans forward to defend to the on side of the pitch
And he takes this one away. Mahela opens the bat-face to push it to the off side
lovely curler, moving in, Mahela holds balance, gets the bat in front of the pad and presents the full bat-face to defend

loud shout for lbw Full in length on the off stump line, Mahela goes for the flick across the line and struck him in front of the middle stump. It would have hit the leg stump. hawk eye shows it would have hit the top of the leg. For some reason, PK didn't appeal strongly. Perhaps he thought there was an inside edge? There wasn't any in fact.
moves in and gets past the prod to run away of the pad
moves away from Mahela who squeezes it out to third man. Very fine over this
walks couple of steps down the track and Munaf shortens the length and pushes it outside off, left alone.
Mahela reaches forward, picks the length delivery from the stumps and plays a pick-up shot, flicks it up and over midwicket.. Dk gives chase. It was around 130 kmph delivery
back of length outside off stump and Dilshan drives on the up but Raina intercepts at short extra cover
Sharp delivery it kicked up from short of length - extra bounce - and moved in a touch. Dilshan is cramped up and stabs it away to the on side
gets this one to straighten at 131 kpmh outside off stump and Mahela leans forward to defend
around the off stump line, dabbed back down the track. Another tight over. He got couple to come in, couple to straighten and one to bounce extra
full in length and outside off stump, Dilshan mistimes the drive to covers
fullish and on the legs and Dilshan whips it through midwicket. Easy pickings. He held his balance well and flicked it away
cuts in from around the off stump line, Dilshan adjusts to jab it away
lands on a length around leg and middle and straightens, Dilshan gets forward to tap it to the on side
peach of a delivery. It landed short of length around middle and off and moved away late. Dilshan was beaten, pushing inside the line
Blast! Some width on offer outside off and from short of length as well, Dilshan sizes it up and whacks it past backward point
Good delivery It landed outside off stump and shapes away, Mahela pushed out at it, bat away from the body, but inside the line. The ball flies past the edge
And this one comes back in with bounce. Mahela was again trying to walk out and tries to clip it to the on side but is hit on the pad. Very high
And this is the delivery with the extra bounce. He whips it at the release. And the ball bounces outside off. Mahela lets it go
fuller in length and straightens outside off, Mahela leans forward to squeeze it to point
moves forward to defend the length delivery that lands just outside off stump.
lands outside off and moves away, Mahela shoulders arms. Another tight over from Munaf.
sprays this to the pads and Dilshan unfurls the leg glance to perfection
on the middle and leg, turned past square-leg
slips another one down the leg side. Dhoni groans as he collects.
on the middle stump line, full in length, turned to Rohit standing to the left of the square-leg umpire
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
cuts in from short of length, on the middle, and moves past the prod and hits high on thigh pad
leans forward to defend it back down the track
pushes this wide outside off stump
Shot Machang! It was a short-of-length delivery outside off and he smokes it on the up. He stayed beside the line, created his own room and punched it through point
goes back and across to chip this wide of third man and he rushes back for the second run. Munaf Patel didn't attack the ball there
This time Munaf rushes across, swoops to stop the ball and fires in a fast throw. It was again short-of-length and Dilshan cut it away
walks down the track couple of steps and Nehra pushes well outside the line. Left alone
kicks up from short of length, Mahela gets on top of the bounce there and taps it towards covers. He thinks about a single but Dilshan says no
lovely delivery length delivery that lands around the off and middle stump line and curved away. Dilshan pushes at it and is beaten.
Extra bounce this time. It kicked up from short of length around off and Dilshan jabs it away
another one that bounces a touch extra, cuts away from the off stump, Dilshan opens the bat-face and steers it to third man
gets back and across to play another bouncing delivery to covers.
Wallop! Mahela charged down the track and Munaf bounced at him. Mahela adjusted to pull it between midwicket and square-leg
fuller in length, on the leg stump line, Mahela tries to flick and it rolls off the pad. Munaf shouts for lbw ... probably going down leg
Fabulicious! He walked forward, fetched the length delivery from outside off and wristed it up and over mid-on!
gets forward to defend
outside the off stump, steered to third man for a single
Thwack! It was a length delivery around the off stump line and Dilshan smacks it on the up and through extra cover.
full in length around off stump, pushed to covers where Raina makes a tumbling stop
around the off stump line, pushed away to covers
full in length, lands outside off and moves away, left alone

beaten! Mahela walks down the track and Munaf shortened the length. And also, cut it away. That was what troubled Mahela and he was squared-up as he pushed inside the line. The ball flew past the edge
this time its on the pads, tucked past square-leg
again on the pads, Dilshan plays the leg glance to the fine-leg region. Nehra manages to get some boot between the ball and the boundary
goes back and across to tap the back-of-length delivery to short midwicket
on the middle and off line, extra bounce on it again, Mahela takes the bottom-hand of the handle and stabs the ball to the on side.
Shot boss! It was a short-of-length delivery just outside off stump, Dilshan stays adjacent to the line and punched it on the up and through point
cuts back in a bit, nothing alarming, punched to extra cover for a single
around the off stump line, Mahela gets forward to tap it to the on side
full in length, moves in from outside off, gets forward to push it to mid-on
fuller, just outside off and moving in, on driven to mid-on
beaten Fullish and this one straightens outside off stump. Mahela goes for the off drive but ends up going inside the line
leans forward to punch it towards mid-off for a single
just outside the off stump line, tapped to point
Fab! He moved down the track and knifed through the line! It was short in length but he went through the line and hit it in the air but well to the right of mid-on
clips this past square-leg for a single
short in length around off, punched away to backward point
outside the off stump, steered to third man
Thunderous! Dilshan the entertainer! He thrust his front foot out and hammered through the line. He went up and over wide long-on. And he hit it on the up. Stunning!
around the middle and leg line, short in length, Dilshan shovels it over midwicket. DK gives chase but can't reach it
back of length again, forced away to right of backward point where Sehwag makes a half-stop
full in length, Mahela glides forward to caress it to mid-on
Wow! Delicious! He glided forward to drive a length delivery on the up and through extra cover. Stylish. Elegant.
leans well forward to defend this back to Ishant
short in length, around the off stump line, pulled away to deep midwicket
short in length just outside off, Dhoni is standing up to the stumps, steered to backward point
short in length and outside off, run down to third man
banged in short, a bouncer around off, Dilshan allows it to fly through to the keeper. Dhoni is standing back for Dilshan
this one climbs around chest-high, on the off and middle line, Dilshan arches back to steer it to third man
short in length around off, run down to Ishant at third man
short delivery and it cramped Dilshan for room and he ended up short-arm jabbing it to midwicket.
pushes this down the leg side for a wide
around the off stump line, pushed out to point
around the off stump line, tucked towards midwicket
around the off stump line, from back of length, steered to backward point
on the middle and leg line, tucked down to fine-leg region
length delivery around the off stump line, punched out to mid-off
Boom! it was a short delivery around the leg and middle line, Dilshan swivels around to play a crunchy pull shot
Fab strike. He moved forward to blast a short-of-length delivery and over extra cover. Fluent swing of the bat. Top shot!
just outside off stump and straightening, Mahela pushes inside the line and is beaten
steers this to backward point
on the middle stump line, Mahela was backing away, trying to give himself some room, and mistimes the punchy drive back to the bowler
sprays this to the leg and middle line and Mahela leans across to glance it away to the fine-leg boundary.
just outside off stump, pushed towards mid-off for a single
around the off stump line, dabbed to square-leg
50 up for Dilshan His 21st. He brought that up in style: It was a short and wide delivery ,cut away past backward point.
presses back to punch to covers
Fine pull shot this time. It was the shoulder-high bouncer and Dilshan pulled it away past square-leg and DK made a tumbling stop
length delivery around off, punched away to right of backward point .. Yuvraj stops and fires a throw at the non striker's end .. back-up isn't cleanly done .. one extra run
stays back to punch it to the off
leans forward to defend it to the off-side of the pitch
banged in short, the slow bouncer, Mahela tries to run ti down to thirdm an but misses. And he smiles
around 127 kmph short ball, pulled away to deep square-leg region
on the middle stump line, moving in, nudged behind square-leg
around 128 kmph short delivery, pulled to deep midwicket
bouncer, around head -high and outside off, Mahela reaches out and swats it down to the ground on the leg side
pushes this to cover point for a single
leans forward to push it to the off side
leans forward to ease it to long-off
backs away to cut it from the off-stump line .. to sweeper cover
slower, on the off stump line, nudged to the on side
on the leg stump line, Dilshan still stays beside the line to push it to mid-on
fullish outside off, Dilshan drives to mid-off
around the off and middle line, pushed to covers ..Raina with the direct hit  at the non-striker's end
banged in short and pulled away without much fuss to fine-leg
on the middle and leg, glanced to Nehra at fine-leg region
on the off-stump line, punched down to long-off
short in length around off, cuts hard but straight to backward point
on the middle and off, pushed to covers
Crunched! It was quicker but also shorter and DIlshan was quick to turn around and pull it to the square-leg boundary
slower, fuller, around off, nudged of the inner edge to the on side
comes in with the arm on the middle, punched to covers
tosses it up higher and fuller, driven down to long-off
length delivery on the middle and leg, squeezed down to fine-leg region

Mahela is gone. Just like that. Against the run of play. He reached forward and tried to wrist it across the line. It flew of the leading edge towards sweeper cover. Pouched! It was a short-of-length delivery that straightened around the off stump. Mahela tried to whip it across the line and got a leading edge
on the middle stump line, punched to mid-off
this one slips down the leg side
goes for the pull and was too early with the shot. The ball arrives later and he edges it to his pad
around the off stump line, steered to point
full in length around the leg and middle line, driven down to long-on
goes on with the arm from round the stumps, Thaanga is beaten, pushing inside the line
flighted full on the middle, off driven to long-off
leans forward to drive inside-out to covers
slower, full and on the middle and off line, jabbed out to covers
just outside the off stump, cut away to deep point
leans forward to drive to covers
gets forward to jab this one away
cuts in from short of length, short-arm-pulled away for a single
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
slanted across Tharanga who steers to third man
banged in short, pulled over square-leg .. Sehwag mops up near the boundary
around the off stump line, leans forward to defend to covers
tossed up slowly around off, driven to long-off
leans forward to dab it back down the track
Super! He leaned back to cut and I thought ok a single or two perhaps but he has placed that one really well. He played it late and it went through backward point
But he is gone now! Yuvraj strikes. It landed outside the off stump and straigthened, Tharanga went for the cut shot again but edged this one!
goes back to push this one for a single
stays back to steer to backward point
gets back and across to cut it away for a single
Crunchy! And Punchy! It was a length delivery outside off and he punched it to the ground and it bounced over short extra cover!
Whack! It was a slower one and Dilshan picked it early and smashed it through extra cover. Not a man move!
Another slower one. and this time Dilshan mistimes the cut
leans forward to push it to the off side
on the middle stump line, pushed to covers
just outside the off stump, cut away to deep point
on the off stump line, pushed to covers
on the middle and leg, nudged wide of midwicket fielder for a quick single
floated around the off stump, eased to covers
on the off stump line, tapped to covers
leans forward to play the off drive
leans forward to drive to covers
punches this one away to deep cover
goes back to pull this behind square-leg region
around the off stump, tapped back to Sehwag
around the off stump line, eased to covers
gets forward to drive down to long-off
on the middle stump line, nurdled wide of midwicket fielder
tossed up around off, driven to long-off
goes back to punch to short cover where DK fails to stop cleanly.
slips this down the leg and Dilshan swats it to fine-leg region
around the off stump, eased to right of covers
goes down on his knee to sweep this one for a single
turns to the middle stump line, tapped to midwicket
leans forward to on drive to long-on
skips down the track to drive to Munaf at long-off
turns in to the middle stump, nudged behind the wicekt on the off side
gets forward to ping long-off
backs away to force it to sweeper cover
on the pads, turned around the corner for an easy single
tossed full outside off and Dilshan plays a neat square drive to deep point region tio pick up couple of runs
backs away to cut the arm-ball to deep point for two more. Raina moves to his left from sweeper cover
flighted around off, tapped to covers
around the off stump line, cut away to point
leans well forward to push it through covers
turns in to the middle and leg line, punched wide of cover fielder
moves down the track and drives to long-off.
turns to the pads, worked to short fine-leg region
on the middle and leg line, turned to midwicket ..
leans forward to on drive to the on side
on the middle and leg line, on driven to long-on
backs away to punch to sweeper cover
tossed up on the middle, eased to long-off
shorter, quicker, cut to point
just outside the off stump, cut away to sweeper cover
just outside the off stump, cut to deep point where Ishant stops
around the off stump line, tapped to point
around the off stump line, pushed out to covers
stretches forward - had to really reach out there- and scoops it over covers
around the leg stump line, pulled away
leans forward to off drive to long-off
skips down the track and drives hard but DK intercepts at short extra cover
pushes it well outside-off and Sanga goes for the cut but can't reach. It's called wide; Dhoni goes oooh and Nehra has a wry smile
leans forward to drive the length delivery to covers
fullish, on the middle and leg, whipped to midwicket
moves down the track and swats the shortish ball towards mid-on for a quick single
short in length around off, cut to point
full in length on the middle, edged away to the on side .. He was looking for a single there to the off side ...
short in length around off, mistimes the cut to backward point
Tonked! Sweet! He sashayed down the track and smashed the full toss over midwicket boundary
leans forward to on drive to long-on
quicker, on the middle and leg line, tries to turn it around for a single but is hit on the pad
goes for the off drive .. mistimes it ... and DK dives to his right at short cover to make a half-stop
punches this to deep cover
leans forward to defend a loopy delivery to the off side
edged through vacant slip region. It was the short-of-length delivery outside off stump and Sanga gets an edge on the intended on-the-up drive
back of length delivery, steered to backward point
slips this down the leg side, Sanga goes for the pull but can't connect
the slow off cutter around the off stump line, tapped to the off side. Slight confusion over the run but they return to the respective position
works this past square-leg for a single
full in length and outside off stump, mistimes the drive to cover
length delivery around the off stump line, pushed through point for a single. And he retains strike.
back of ;length around the off stump line, steered to Yuvraj at backward point
leans forward to push it away to the off side.

Dilshan roars! And jumps for joy. He also points to his name on the back of the shirt. He was looking to push it and it runs past square-leg and they run hard to come back for the second run. Sanga gets across to hug him
Much fun! Now that the hundred is over and done with, he goes for the big shot. It was the bouncer and he pulled it to the wide midwicket boundary.
on the pads and Dilshan fails to put this one away. It rolls of the pad to Dhoni
hits on the up to deep cover. He struck that cleanly but couldn't' place it wide of the fielder
full in length, Dilshan clears the front leg and tries to drive hard but mistimes it. He will still get a single, though, as the ball bounces over Nehra
short and outside off, Sanga tries the cut but the ball flies over the blade
on the leg stump line, following Sanga who was trying to be outside leg .. the ball hits the pad .. Dilshan and Sanga have a chat
full in length, on the middle, turned to midwicket
backs away to force it through the off side but can only mistime the cut shot towards mid-off. He crosses over
full in length on the off and middle. Dilshan goes inside-out to left of mid-off where Rohit dives but fails to stop it cleanly. Nehra is not impressed with the effort
Smack! He moved outside leg stump and flat-batted the short delivery over extra cover. Slap!
from round the stumps, Sanga mistimes the drive back to Ishant
short in length from round the stumps, jabbed out to short midwicket
slower one, Sanga tries to work it to the on side but misses to connect .. it hits his body
Another mistimed drive. Sanga isn't happy with himself. He leaned forward for the big off drive over mid-off but mistimes it completely ..
slower off cutter, cut to cover  point for a single
floats it full, on driven to long-on
fullish outside off and driven to left of sweeper cover for two runs. PK is not happy that Virat alowed Sanga to take two runs .. and has a few words to say. Even DHoni isn't too happy
Juicy full toss. Thank you, bowl again!. Sanga smashes it through wide mid-off
moves down the track, tries to take it on the full but it dips on him and he pushes it to long-on

DIlshan falls after an entertaining and very valuable knock. It was the bouncer, around head-high, around the off and middle stump line and DIlshan couldn't keep the pull down. Neither could he clear the boundary. Ishant collected it at deep backward square-leg region. Very fine innings.
pushes this wide outside off stump
fullish, driven to left of PK who deflects it towards mid-off
down the leg side and Dhoni collects
run out chance missed jabs this to short midwicket ... Rohit stops and fires the throw but misses the stumps at the non-striker's end
leans forward to squeeze this to extra cover
shortish delivery, pulled limply to short midwicket
fuller, on the middle, edges the drive to short midwicket
tries the bouncer, pulled away to right of the sub Jadeja at deep square-leg region
fullish, on the middle and off, eased wide of midwicket for a single
58th ODI 50! Brought up with a fierce pull shot. He crashed the short-of-length delivery over midwicket
reaches forward to drive to long-off for a single
The short fine-leg was up and PK slips this outside leg. Kapu helps it along the corner to the fine-leg boundary
straighter, fuller as well, driven towards mid-on
moves down the track and drives well to the right of mid-on ..  Nehra puts in a excellent dive to take some pace of the ball and DK rushes across from long-off to pick up the ball
tries a yorker, it ends as a dipping full delivery and Kapu tries to square drive and it runs of the toe end of the bat and through the vacant slip region
moves down the track for the big hit but mistimes it to midwicket. It was a low full toss but the bottom-hand slipped of the handle and the ball rolls away
doesn't get wood on leather this time
Fine catch from DK at deep backward square-leg. Kapu had swung the full length delivery rather well actually but DK rushed to his left and tumbled down to take it inches off the turf.
short in length outside off, run down to DK at third man
just outside off stump, pushed back down the track
on the middle and leg, rearing up towards the rib cage, Angelo takes the bottom-hand of the handle and stabs the ball past square-leg
slips this down the leg side and he misses the flick shot and Dhoni dives to his left to make a half-stop
Classy! He bent down on his knee to unfurl a neat square drive past backward point. Very elegant.
Sliced away! He took couple of steps down the track, took it on the full and wristed it superbly past backward point. No one there.
What a shot! Whaddaaplayaaa! He leaned forward to biff a length delivery up and over mid-off. Awesome!
slower one on the middle, steered past backward point
full in length around the off stump line, Angelo wanted it to go over mid-on but ended up dragging it straight to midwicket.
starts this over with a slower one outside off and Sanga fails to adjust and doesn't get any wood on leather
another slower one, outside off, this time Sanga steers it to third man
gets forward to drive to mid-off and runs with the shot
pushes this wide outside off stump. The umpire extends his arms.

runs down the track for the big hit but is beaten by the change of length (Munaf shortened the length); he tried to go through with the shot, go through the line of the delivery but ended up chipping it high towards covers. Fine knock but it's over now. Five overs left. Crucial wicket this.
straightens around off stump, tapped to covers
length delivery around off stump, driven back to the over
starts with a bouncer, pulled away past square-leg. DK stops
short of length outside off and Silva goes for the pull but doesn't connect
Fuller and Silva drives between the bowler and mid-off. Munaf rushes across from long-on and gets his boot in between the ball and the boundary
the slower one outside off and Perera slices it down to third man
fullish, on the middle, pushed wide of midwicket fielder for a quick single
low full toss outside off, edges the intended big off drive to midwicket
on the middle stump line, Perera is cramped for room and pushes it out to covers
slower one around off, leading edge on the on drive and the ball rolls to covers
doesn't pick the slower one and mistimes the shot and the ball rolls away back down the track
works this to the off side for a single
yet another fine slower one and Silva mistimes the swing over midwicket ..
on the off stump line, pushed towards long-on for a single
low full toss outside off and Silva completely mistimes the slog-smash to midwicket. Rohit with the throw but misses the stumps at the non striker's end
Fine slower one .. It was on the leg stump line and almost went over the stick in fact. Silva went for the pull but didn't connect

Hello! hello! The bat goes flying out Sivla's hand and the ball runs to the boundary! He went for the big slog across the line - it was the slower one - and the bat slipped over his head and over the stumps. The ball ran of the inner edge to fine-leg
tries to play the sweep! He doesn't connect
shuffles to outside off and swings to deep midwicket
pushes this way outside off stump
mistimes the pull shot but will get a single
low full toss on the middle, whipped wide of long-on for couple of runs
tries the slower one but slips down the leg side
moves outside leg and hits the fullish delivery to midwicket
picks the slower one from outside off and drags it to long-on
bangs in a bouncer on the leg stump line and Dhoni collects
He is a fab player of the pull shot and plays a crunchy pull shot here. He swiveled nicely to superbly pull the short-of-length delivery
slips another wide down the leg side
fullish, on the middle and leg, driven to long-on

All too simple! A short of length delivery around the off stump. A big swing to the leg side. Dhoni takes the catch. He throws the ball back to Munaf. The batsman walks away. Munaf walks back to the top of the bowling mark.
slips to the pads and Randiv plays the leg glance to perfection
is beaten by the slower one but they try to get across for a run. Dhoni throws but can't find the stumps
another fine slower one - he has bowled really well in the end overs here - . another swing and a miss
shuffles right across the stumps and misses the flick. the ball bounds off the pad and they try to steal a leg bye. Munaf picks the ball and runs to remove the bails at the non-striker's end
goes for the big slog over midwicket but edges it to the off side. Sri Lanka finish on 299!

inn2.comm: What a start! Just a fraction wide and he's destroyed it, slightly back of a length, rocks back and crashes it through the covers
slower, 128 kmph, short and way too wide, he opted to go for it and mistimed it back to the bowler
lovely timing, this is exciting stuff, short, slower ball as well, spotted it early, moved back and just punched it past point, raced away
bangs it short on middle this time, gets into position early and knocks it into the leg side past square leg for a single
just a hint of movement away from the right hander there, lands on a good length and Karthik shoulders arms

Karthik walks back disappointed, bowled it short just outside leg and he went after it, trying to work it down fine, there was a deviation and Sangakkara clasped it diving to his left, we're not sure if he gloved it but the umpire Rauf was certain, India suffer their first bowler
some swing there for Kulasekara, down the leg side and Sangakkara snaps it brilliantly diving to his left
swung in again, rolls towards short midwicket after he got an inside edge onto the pad
went the other way this time and Sehwag went after it, no footwork, that's normal for him, but no connection either
ooooh, Sehwag turns the face a little early on that one, nipped away again and produced the leading edge, landed well short of mid-off
short and he latches on, totally unfazed by the nervy moments before this, slashed away over point for a boundary
A bit of width and Sehwag creams it through the covers for another boundary
bowls it on a good length outside off, holds its line and Kohli leaves it be
ooh, took it from the stumps, full on middle and he shuffled to flick it through square leg for a couple of runs, slightly uppish as well
short of a good length on the off, rock solid this time, defends it off the front foot towards cover
short of a good length just a fraction outside off, shaping away and he leaves it be
oversteps and Sehwag will face the freehit, shortish on middle, turns the face and works it past midwicket for a single
misses out, short and wide and Sehwag looked for the upper-cut, didn't connect
appeal for lbw, lots of movement, lands on the off and darts back in to catch him on the pads as he shuffles across, would have been sliding down
steps across to a delivery moving in again and turns it towards square leg

appeal for lbw, prodigious movement again, short of a good length and spat back in, Kohli looked to play it off the back foot, got a thin inside edge, was struck outside the line and it landed short of Sanga
good comeback, full on the off stump and he eases it past the bowler and mid-off with a full face, sweet shot
bowls it on the good length outside off, no movement this time, knocks it down towards cover
holds it back slightly this time, Kohli gets on the back foot and defends it into the leg side
back of length, lands outside off and skids on, Sehwag punches it on the up to deep backward point region. Good throw in from Silva and Sanga breaks the stumps but Sehwag was home
similar delvery, Sehwag slices it to backward point. Free hit coming up, though
backs away from the leg stump and Malinga fires it full outside off and Sehwag can't get any bat on it. He has a laugh about it
slips in the slower one - full and outside off stump - Sehwag goes for it and ends up slashing it of the outer edge well clear of the second slip

Almost holes out at mid-off It was a lovely slower one on the middle stump line, Sehwag was looking to whip it across the line and checks his shot and gets a leading edge  but it falls short of mid-off
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
length delivery just outside off stump and Virat gets forward to defend it compactly out to the off side
back of length delivery that straightens outside off, Sehwag stays beside the line to carve it hard but straight to backward point
goes back to punch a length delivery around off to point
Crunched! IT was a short of length delivery on the off stump line and Sehwag whacks it on the up and through covers.

run out missed It cut in and bounded of the pad to short fine-leg fielder and he ran blind ... Malinga was the fielder who made a diving half-stop  .. Sanga picked the ball and threw but missed the stumps. Had he hit. Sehwag, who was turning back, would have been out
Huge swing and a miss. He cleared the front foot and tried to crash it over mid-off but missed

Huge shout for lbw  but Sehwag is run out ! It was the wonderful inswinger from Kula that seemed to have trapped Sehwag right in front. Shout for lbw but Ashoka says not out. Sehwag tries to steal a leg bye but there was no run in it. He tried to turn back but it was too late by then to meet a direct hit. The lbw appeal looked so good, don't know why that's want given out, and the ball rolled towards backward point  And he couldn't beat the direct hit from Kapugedera!
full in length and outside off stump, left alone
leans forward to punch-drive the length delivery superbly through extra cover
slower one around the off stump line, defended to the off side
awkward lifter just outside off, a surprised Virat tries to take his bat away from the line of the fire but ends up stabbing it to left of backward point
He keeps playing that cover drive of his. This time he leaned across to drive between cover and cover point ....

Huge shout for a catch from Sanga but Ashoka turns this down as well. There was some noise and a nick! Not given out. It was a length delivery in the zone outside off stump and Yuvraj poked at it. Huge shout but not given. The Sri Lankans were all celebrating but ..
around the off stump line, steered past backward point
just outside off stump, defended on the front foot
leans forward to defend a length delivery to the off side
around the off stump line, worked away to mid-on
just outside off stump, pushed out to covers
leans forward to defend the length delivery back to Angelo
leans well forward to defend this one towards mid-off
Almost caught at short midwicket It was a length delivery on the middle and leg line and Yuvraj ended up chipping it just wide the lunging short midwicket fielder
full in length around off and middle, pushed to mid-on
Wow! Gorgeous! He has been playing some awesome on-the-up cover drives tonight. This time he leaned across to punch a length delivery through covers. So easy on the eye.
on the middle stump line, straightens, tapped back to the bowler
on the leg and middle line, worked to man standing to the right of square-leg umpire
lands outside off and moves away further. Left alone. The first two balls straightened on the leg and middle and this one moved away but he pushed this one too far across
on the middle stump line, tapped to midwicket
around the off stump line, defended to the off side
moves in from outside off, pushed out to mid-on
fullish, on the middle stump line, whipped away to deep midwicket for a single
leans forward to defend to the off side
leans forward to drive to that deep-cover fielder

Edged, caught but it's a no ball!  And it appears that it was not a no ball! There seemed to a bit of foot behind the line! Oh well... IT was the bouncer on the leg stump line and Yuvraj edged his attempted pull shot. Angelo landed his foot just behind the line and then just slid out ..Very tough for the umpire ..
slower one , outside off stump, edges the pull shot to fine-leg region
leans forward to punch the length delivery through point
leans forward to punch the length delivery to mid-off
just outside off stump, Virat leans forward to defend to the off side
gets forward to punch this one to mid-on
moved in towards the middle stump line, cramps Virat who manages to stab it past square-leg
goes for another bouncer at Yuvraj who almost gets the bat in a vertical positon and crunches it through midwicket!
just outside off stump, steered past point
he read the slower one early and used his bottom-hand to smash it from outside off to the long-on boundary
just outside the off stump, pushed towards mid-on
on the pads, turned past square-leg
around the off stump line, punched out to mid-off
lands outside leg stump, clipped to fine-leg for a single
Cracker! It was a length delivery outside off stump and he went on the up and through cover point. Classy
Huge shout for lbw but not given.. It landed around the leg stump and Yuvraj, it seems, gets some bat on it as the tries to jab it .. bat and pad i reckon ... hope they show another replay
Edged wide of the diving Mahela at slips. It cut away from Yuvraj who pushed out at it and it flew of the edge . Mahela dived to his left but couldn't reach ...
gets forward to defend to the off side
short in length on the middle and leg, clipped wide of mid-on
full in length and it moves back in  .. Virat was a touch late in getting the bat across but does so eventually to push it to midwicket
around the off stump line, squeezed out to point
Another fine cover drive. He leaned across to drive the full-length delivery through extra covers
tries the bouncer, around head-high, and Yuvraj tries to swat it through midwicket! The ball flies past his helmet. Very harsh call to term it a wide
gets forward to tap this one back down the track
full in length around off stump line, pushed out to mid-off
walks down the track and then adjusts to the shortening of the length by tapping it to mid-off
length delivery in the zone outside off and Virat defends compactly back to the bowler
just outside off stump, Yuvraj mistimes the drive to mid-off

Gone this time! It kicked up from short of length and also straightened around middle. That straightening did Yuvraj in. He tried to adjust to it by attempting an awkward whip across the line and seems to have got the inner edge. Yuvraj stood in the dressing room and waited to watch the replays. Does it mean he thinks he didn't get an edge? Or does it mean he just wanted to see what was the ball and what he played? No snickometer replay shown yet
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
fullish in length, around off, mistimes it to mid-on
in the corridor outside off stump, left alone
stays back to punch to covers ... there is a direct hit at the non-striker's end
leans forward to defend to the off
around the off stump, very compactly defended to hte off
shuffles across to punch to mid-on
around the off and middle stump line and Virat whipped it wide of mid-on for couple of runs.
shortish delivery outside off and it didn't climb all that high at all! Kohli watches it sail through to Sanga
lifting delivery outside off stump, left alone
shuffles right across the stumps and tries to whip it across the line but is hit on the pad. He was struck outside the off stump
walks down the track and mistimes the drive to mid-off
stays back to punch to cover
punches this away for a single
short of length just outside off, pushed away
short in length and some extra bounce on it as it straightens outside off, Virat is beaten, pushing inside the line
full in length and Dhoni walks forward and across and drives to the left of the bowler. It races away.
Sanga  stands up to the stumps. Dhoni punches this one to the off side
stays back to punch to the off side
short in length around off, punched to right of extra cover where Randiv makes a diving half-stop
Shout for a catch by Sanga It was the bouncer just over Virat who went for the pull and missed it. No edge there. Not given a wide.
leans across to play a very neat square drive and Kapu makes a fine diving stop at backward point
full in length around off, driven to mid-off
full in length just outside off, squeezed past point
leans across to fetch the full delivery from just outside off and whips it wide of mid-on. Fab strike
reaches out to steer to point
leans forward to punch it to the off side
leans across to punch it to mid-on
leans forward to wrist it past square-leg
on a length outside off, punched away to sweeper cover
Whacked! It was short and wide and Dhoni smashed it through covers. He stayed on the back foot and cut it.

Loud shout for lbw but turned down by Rauf. The Sri Lankans can't believe it. It moved in from outside off stump, went through the bat and pad gap and hit his pad in front of the off stump. That was very close. That looks out. Replays show it would have hit the stumps. Hmmm .. Rauf has given it as an inside edge. Replays don't confirm any edge.
gets forward to push it away for a single
shuffles right across and almost pulls the ball to his stumps! He got an inside edge and almost dragged it to his sticks

Perera, the Indian Specialist, strikes. It was the short-of-length delivery cutting away like a leg cutter and Virat went for the pull. Too late. The ball flew of the edge to third man. Gone! Vital vital moment this
stays back to punch to covers
outside off stump, punched to deep cover
gets forward to drive to left of mid-on
leans forward to punch it on the up to mid-off
shuffles across to flick it to deep midwicket
fetches the short of length delivery from outside off and ends up edging the pull to the on side. Hmmm risky...
bouncer on the off and middle, pulled away to deep backward square-leg
stays well back for a very full delivery and ends up jabbing it to the on side
gets back and across to clip a back-of-length delivery from the off and middle line to left of mid-on
shuffles across, Angelo fires it full, hoping to trap him lbw, Dhoni gets the bat in front of the pad just in time
Wallop! He rushed down the track and has smashed it on the up over long-off! Violence!
goes back to clip this to behind square-leg
length delivery outside off, mistimes the drive to mid-off
banged in short outside off, Dhoni allows it fly through to Sanga
stays back to push the short-of-length delivery around off stump to covers
moves down the track, receives a bouncer and he adjusts to pull it to deep backward square-leg fielder
turns in from outside off, worked to square-leg
spins in to middle and off, punched to short cover
flighted around off, turns, Dhoni lunges forward to defend
lunges forward to squeeze it back to Suraj
flighted full around off and middle, on driven to long-on
leans forward to work the ball from the middle-stump line to backward square-leg
shout for lbw but it landed outside leg and was missing leg stump. Fullish and just down leg, Raina fails to connect with the flick shot
That forward and across movement is landing him into trouble. He was on the move as he pushed out at it and the ball flew past the edge
Hammered! He thrust his front foot out and smashed the length delivery over mid-off
fuller, almost yorker length outside off, dug out past the bowler
hops back to a back-of-length delivery and jabs it from the middle stump line to backward square-leg
banged in short around off, about chest-high, swatted past square-leg
goes back to punch the off break to short cover
moves down the track for the big hit but ends up dragging it along the ground towards long-on
takes couple of steps down the track and defends
Thunderous hit! He went down on his knee, fetched the flighted delivery from outside off and swung it over wide long on
threatens to jump out before he leans forward to tap it to the on side
floated full outside off, Raina drives hard but can't beat short extra cover
beaten! slings it full on a length just outside off and Dhoni is beaten, pushing inside the line
stays back to run this down to third man
low full toss, around 140 kmph, Raina defends it back down the track and then smiles
fine dipping yorker on the off stump line, it ends up a low full toss, turned wide of midwicket
presses right back and across to defend a length delivery to the off side
shapes away from the off stump, from a length, Dhoni shapes to defend and edges it to third man. Fine over
stays back to cut it well to the left of sweeper cover
tries to back away to create room but hits straight to cover
on the middle and leg, turned to short fine-leg region
around the off stump line, pushed to covers
ooh lovely arm ball it came in with the over spin towards the off stump, Raina was looking for the cut and ended up jabbing it away
moves down the track and drives to long-on
crouches to pushes it through midwicket for couple of runs
in the zone outside off stump, Raina searches it, bat well away from the body. and is beaten ..
is late in getting forward, ends up landing on his front heel and edges the push to the on side
length delivery on the off stump line, Dhoni stays back to defend to the off side
length delivery on the middle stump line, squeezed past square-leg
hops to tuck the bouncing short-of-length delivery past square-leg
slips it down the leg side and Raina helps it along the corner. Easy pickings. He swings it to the fine-leg boundary
gets down the track and works it to deep midwicket
stays back to push this one away to long-on

Now then.. now then... raina has combusted! He charged down the track for the big hit but Randiv did him in flight and then by the turn. Fine bowler this man. Raina was trying to swing it over long-on but it dipped on him and flew right up of the top edge. Dilshan back pedaled at covers and for a while it seemed he had misjudged it. However, he cupped his palms over and behind his head to pouch the catch! Sri Lanka scream for joy. Enter Rohit Sharma.
stays back to work it behind square-leg
leans forward to defend and the ball goes of bat and pad to the leg side
gets forward to push it through mid-off for a single
short in length outside off stump, pushed away to point
pushes it well outside off stump and Sanga collects
cuts in from outside off, run down to third man
slower one, outside off stump, forced away to sweeper cover
just outside off stump, opens the bat-face to run it down to third man
slower off cutter around the leg stump line, nudged behind square-leg
goes back to work it behind square-leg
tries to sweep a delivery from well outside off and is hit on the body
straighter and Rohit sweeps this one for a single
presses back to dab it past square-leg
flighted delivery, really full, on driven to long-on
on the middle stump line, turned wide of midwicket
back of length delivery that straightens on the off stump line, pushed out to covers
Fisted! He stayed back to force the short of length delivery outside through covers.
well outside the off stump, Dhoni can't reach it and Sanga collects
presses back to punch it to sweeper cover
short in length outside off stump, punched to deep cover
short in length outside off, punched away to covers
just outside the off stump, pushed back to the bowler

Stumped! Rohit's failures continue. A touch bizzare dismissal! This is what happened: It was a lovely off break  outside the off stump, Rohit lunged forward to defend but the ball dipped and turned through the bat and pad gap (not sure whether there was an inside edge)  It dropped just short of Sanga who failed to collect it cleanly but it hit his boot and re bounded on to the stumps. Rohit had stretched his back leg outside the crease in trying to push out at that ball. Another fine delivery from Suraj
leans forward to off drive and edges it to the on side
lunges forward to push it back down the track
Pk is struggling here. Another well-flighted delivery and PK edges another off drive to midwicket
gets back to defend it to the off side
How did that miss the leg stump? It turned in sharply, PK had a clueless waft , the ball went through the bat and pad gap but missed the leg stump and ran away to fine-leg boundary.
full in length on the middle stump line, Dhoni mistimes the drive back to Malinga
fullish delivery, pushed out towards mid-on
Loud shout for lbw A inswinging yorker that hit the boot but the point of impact was outside the leg stump. There wasn't any bat on it though it has been given as runs.
fullish, swung away to deep midwicket for a single
low full toss outside the leg stump, flicked away to fine-leg region where Kulasekara makes a tumbling stop
fullish outside off stump, driven to mid-off
cuts in sharply from outside off, cuts PK into half and moves over the leg stump, Sanga does well to stop it with an outstretched left hand
moves down the track, gets outside leg and drives to long-on
sprays this full delivery down the leg side
full delivery on the middle, driven to mid-off for a single
PK goes down town. He moves outside leg stump and crashed this full-length delivery over the straight boundary
fullish, pushed back to the bowler
backs down the leg side. Kula follows him with a really full delivery. Swing and a miss. The ball goes between the stumps and PK
full pitched around off stump, Dhoni drags it of the inner half of the bat to mid-on
banged in short outside off and left alone
short delivery that followed PK who was moving down the leg side and he somehow manages to steer it through the vacant slip region
yorker length almost on the leg stump, squeezed past square-leg
full delivery outside off stump, pushed out for a single
Clatter! What a yorker. Straight, pacy and inswinging. Gone! PK had a waft but had no chance to stop that.
low full toss, driven to long-on and that's his fifty
lands on a length around off and cuts away, Ishant is beaten
on a length on the middle, tapped to the on side
in the channel outside off stump and Ishant has another nervous poke and is beaten again
stays back to nudge it to midwicket
leans forward to push to covers
full pitched outside off, driven straight to mid-off
super yorker on the middle stump line, low swinging dipping full delivery, edged away to the on side
the slow bouncer outside off, cut away to sweeper cover and he doesn't take the single
pushes this wide outside off stump
low swinging full delivery on the pads, flicked away for a single
yorker length that goes past Ishant's defensive waft but somehow misses the off stump
this one swings in, Ishant gets back to push it back down the track
short delivery, pulled to right of deep midwicket
outside off stump, short in length again - think he is expecting Dhoni to charge out - Dhoni stays back to late cut to third man boundary
leans well forward to defend it back down the track
leans forward to push it the on side of the pitch and Suraj makes a diving stop
stretches forward to defend to the off
gets back to turn this to short midwicket
gets forward to defend to the off side
in the zone outside off stump, Ishant is beaten
leans forward to mistime the drive to covers
slower one that straightens outside off and Ishant is beaten again..
Yorked! It was full and on the off stump line. Ishant pushed inside the line and the off stump was pegged back.
full in length around the off stump line, he gets forward to defend
leans forward to defend it to the on side
on the off stump line, punched down to long-on but doesn't take the run
moves down the track but doesn't get to the pitch of the delivery. He then defends
leans forward to push this back to Randiv
he rushes down the track and smashes this over long-on
leans forward to flick it past square-leg
from round the stumps, fullish, dragged down the track. Free hit coming up, though
really full delivery just outside off and Dhoni plays his trademark whippy bottom-hand powered helicopter shot! It goes to long-on but he refuses to take the single
gets forward to push this to the off side
full delivery around off, goes for the big slog but mistimes it to the on side. It goes past midwicket but he wont take the run again
still from round the stumps, full and outside off, left alone
fullish delivery, driven out to covers where Dilshan makes a tumbling stop
drives this full delivery to long-on
length delivery outside off, edges his defensive poke to the on side
full delivery on the middle, pushed out to midwicket
on the legs ,flicked past square-leg but he wont take the run. The game meandering along ..
low full toss and it has been driven to long-off. No run taken of course
this time he takes the single after pinging long-off
some extra bounce on that top spinner, left alone
leans across to defend it to the off side
yorker on the off stump line, from round the stumps, dug out to the off side
fullish outside off, driven to right of long-off for a single. They think about the second but won't take the risk
full in length outside off, pushed to point
banged in short and Nehra top edges the pull shot over midwicket
Nehra leans forward to try lofting it over mid-off but ends up lobbing it to mid-off. And then they were one. Sri Lanka are closing in on a crushing win here
full delivery around off, squeezed out to point
goes down the track and mistimes it back to Suraj
spins down the leg side
skips down the track and mistimes the drive to short midwicket
floated outside off stump, driven to long-off
low full toss, eased towards long-off. Hmmm

And that's it. Sri Lanka have completed a crushing win. Fine spirited performance from Sri Lanka.  The end came when the Indian captain Dhoni went down the track for the big hit but ended up dragging it to his stumps. Randiv roared. Sanga, Mahela, Randiv enveloped each other with a hug. The rest of the team-mates converged.
